content:
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/95150 @project-const-generics that seems like a quite straightforward issue:

  • grep for "forbidden as the type of a const generic parameter"
  • look at that function for a bit
  • change it so that the second error isn't emitted on stable (probably actually change the control flow to start by branching on tcx.features().adt_const_params

@Vikram Pal you've expressed interest in helping out with const generics, this might be a good first issue if you want.

apart from that I am currently working on summarizing the current state of const generics in https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/260443-project-const-generics/topic/design.20book. So until that's done and we have a clearer picture of how to get to our goals there sadly isn't too much you can help with
ok will surely look into this - this weekend
to claim the issue, what do I need to do? "@rustbot claim"?
did you look into this this weekend? If you have any questions or are stuck somewhere, please ask!
